select_sql: [No_],[Vendor No_],[Vendor Item No_],[Description],[Description 2],[Type],[Product Group Code],[Item Category Code],[Blocked],[Gross Weight (kg)] AS [Gross Weight],[Unit Volume (CBM)] AS [Unit Volume],[Unit Cost],[Order Multiple],[Maximum Inventory],[Unit Price],[Base Unit of Measure],[Minimum Order Quantity],[Price Includes VAT],[Production BOM No_],[Last Direct Cost],[Lead Time Calculation],[Replenishment System],[Purch_ Unit of Measure],[Reordering Policy],[Safety Stock Quantity],[Reorder Point]
[Item No_],[Code],[Qty_ per Unit of Measure],[Length (cm)] as [Length],[Width (cm)] as [Width],[Height (cm)] as [Height],[Cubage (CBM)] as [Cubage],[Net Weight (kg)] as [Weight]
